Uses of Interface
org.ow2.bonita.facade.identity.User

Packages that use User
org.ow2.bonita.facade Contains interfaces for accessing Bonita APIs. 
org.ow2.bonita.facade.identity.impl Contains classes defining identity entities (internal use only). 
org.ow2.bonita.facade.internal All interfaces in this package are for internal use only. 
org.ow2.bonita.facade.runtime.command Contains classes in order to work with Bonita console (internal use only). 
 

Uses of User in org.ow2.bonita.facade
 

Methods in org.ow2.bonita.facade that return User
 User IdentityAPI.addUser(String username, String password)
          Create a new a user
 User IdentityAPI.addUser(String username, String password, String firstName, String lastName, String email)
          Deprecated. use one of the other addUser methods
 User IdentityAPI.addUser(String username, String password, String firstName, String lastName, String title, String jobTitle, String managerUserUUID, Map<String,String> profileMetadata)
          Create a new a user
 User IdentityAPI.findUserByUserName(String username)
          Retrieve a user from its username
 User IdentityAPI.getUser(String username)
          Deprecated. use IdentityAPI.findUserByUserName(String) instead
 User IdentityAPI.getUserByUUID(String userUUID)
          Retrieve a user from its UUID
 User IdentityAPI.importUser(String userUUID, String username, String passwordHash, String firstName, String lastName, String title, String jobTitle, String managerUserUUID, Map<String,String> profileMetadata)
          Import a user
 User IdentityAPI.updateUser(String oldUsername, String username, String password, String firstName, String lastName, String email)
          Deprecated. use IdentityAPI.updateUserByUUID(String, String, String, String, String, String, String, Map) to update the user's info and use IdentityAPI.updateUserPassword(String, String) to change the user's password.
 User IdentityAPI.updateUserByUUID(String userUUID, String username, String firstName, String lastName, String title, String jobTitle, String managerUserUUID, Map<String,String> profileMetadata)
          Update a user
 User IdentityAPI.updateUserPassword(String userUUID, String password)
          Update the user's password.

          Deprecated. use IdentityAPI.getAllUsers() instead
 List<User> IdentityAPI.getUsers(int fromIndex, int numberOfUsers)
          Retrieve a limited number of users (for paginated UI)
 List<User> IdentityAPI.getUsers(int fromIndex, int numberOfUsers, UserCriterion pagingCriterion)
          Retrieve a limited number of users (for paginated UI) order by the given pagingCriterion
 List<User> IdentityAPI.getUsersByManagerUUID(String managerUUID)
          Retrieve all the users having the same manager
 List<User> IdentityAPI.getUsersByUUIDs(Collection<String> userUUIDs)
          Retrieve a list of users
 List<User> IdentityAPI.getUsersInGroup(String groupUUID, int fromIndex, int numberOfUsers)
          Retrieve a limited number of a group's users (for paginated UI)
 List<User> IdentityAPI.getUsersInGroup(String groupUUID, int fromIndex, int numberOfUsers, UserCriterion pagingCriterion)
          Retrieve a limited number of a group's users (for paginated UI) oder by the given criterion
 Set<User> IdentityAPI.getUsersInRole(String roleName)
          Deprecated. use IdentityAPI.getAllUsersInRoleAndGroup(String, String) instead with the default group IdentityAPI.DEFAULT_GROUP_NAME
 List<User> IdentityAPI.getUsersInRole(String roleUUID, int fromIndex, int numberOfUsers)
          Retrieve a limited number of the users in a role (for paginated UI)
 List<User> IdentityAPI.getUsersInRole(String roleUUID, int fromIndex, int numberOfUsers, UserCriterion pagingCriterion)
          Retrieve a limited number of the users in a role (for paginated UI)
